meaningMnemonic: Someone breaks part of your <radical>window</radical>. Who did this? It was your <kanji>mother</kanji>!
readingMnemonic: Suddenly your <kanji>mother</kanji> points her bloodied finger at you and laughs, "<reading>Haha</reading> (はは)!" She keeps laughing, haha haha haha, over and over. You feel even more alarmed.
